text: Egha gɨn Aisak danganir kam ategha egha mozir par igharazim gɨkui. Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn gumaziba uam a bagha uari adozir puvatɨ. Ezɨ Aisak ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir God deragha e gami, eghtɨ e datɨrɨghɨn nguazir kamɨn deragh daperagh egh bizir avɨriba kagh ikiam.” Egha a mozir pam ziar kam a gatɨ, “Dabirabim derazir danganim.”
